name: Shrimp with Fresh Pineapple and Corn
author: Homer Green
summary: This is a sweet little experiment with shrimp and pineapple that I tried one night on my family. It has few ingredients so it is cheap and easy for small middle-class families like ours.
ingredients: 25  uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon blackened seasoning, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 bunch fresh spinach, or to taste
directions: Cook the shrimp on medium-high heat until fully pink, seasoning with blackened seasoning while you stir, about 5 minutes
Add pineapple and allow to cook for 5 to 7 minutes
Mix in corn and cook for 5 to 7 minutes
Serve warm on a bed of spinach
